meanings.definition: A type of Australian acacia tree.
meanings.sent1: The yarran tree has beautiful yellow flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a yarran while hiking in the outback.
meanings.sent3: The koala climbed the yarran tree and took a nap.
meanings.sent4: The yarran tree stood tall like a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the yarran tree filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: To make a loud, harsh cry.
meanings.sent1: The bird will yarran loudly to protect its nest.
meanings.sent2: I heard the fox yarran in the distance at night.
meanings.sent3: The baby's yarran startled the cat, making it jump.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm seemed to yarran angrily at the world.
meanings.sent5: The old house seemed to yarran in the wind, creaking and groaning.
